channel.title: How do i make a new monster drop items?
channel.description: please people i need to know how to make a new monster drop items that i added to npcdrops.cfg and nothing drops from it even when i compiled ... help please

item.title: How do i make a new monster drop items?
item.dc:creator: @scottbenton scottbenton
item.description:
@scottbenton wrote:

[quote=“s p i d a z, post:1, topic:181084”]okay your problem is your java so go to my computer>C:>windows>and delete system 32 post if it worked[/quote] i know alot more about computers than you think spidaz system 32 is a very important folder with files with your system info etc please do not post moronic stuff like this

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a new monster drop items?

item.title: How do i make a new monster drop items?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Npchandler.java sample:

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 142) { ItemHandler.addItem(Item.randomMethod(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false); }

Item.java sample:

[code]public static int randomMethod[] = {3204,4087,6568,4089,6562,5576,6216,6237,4091,
7407,4093,6568,6524,4503,6562,6382,4095,
3140,7407,4097,4675,4151,995,5730,5575,
6524,4131,6562,4212,4224,995,4087,4504,
4505,4506,4507,4585};

public static int randomMethod()
{
   return randomMethod[(int)(Math.random()*randomMethod.length)];
}[/code]

Read full topic
